scripts.update-deploy: curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iconix/gith-deployer/master/hook.js > hook.js && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iconix/gith-deployer/master/hook.sh > hook.sh && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iconix/gith-deployer/master/setup.sh > setup.sh && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iconix/gith-deployer/master/update.sh > update.sh
